description: This file defines the MainActivity class for an Android expense tracker app. It serves as the main entry point, wiring up UI components with the ViewModel, setting up observers for reactive UI updates, and handling user interactions for month navigation.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main Android activity for the expense tracker app, responsible for initializing UI components, setting up event listeners, and observing ViewModel state flows to update the UI.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets up the activity, inflates the layout, and initializes click listeners and observers for reactive UI updates.

methods.name: setupClicks
methods.description: Assigns click listeners to previous and next month buttons to navigate through months.

methods.name: setupObservers
methods.description: Launches coroutines to observe ViewModel StateFlows and update UI elements accordingly.
